languages.text: "Всякое познание опасно. Цена познания — его опасность. Это — священная плата за таинство, а не запрет".
"All knowledge is dangerous. The peril in knowledge is the price of it. It is a sacred fee for a rite, not a prohibition."
languages.original_text: "Всякое познание опасно. Цена познания — его опасность. Это — священная плата за таинство, а не запрет".

traits.locale_text: "All knowledge is dangerous. The peril in knowledge is the price of it. It is a sacred fee for a rite, not a prohibition."

languages.text: 「すべての知識は危険なものだ。知識に潜む危険は知識の代償。儀式の聖なる対価であり、止められるものではありません」
languages.original_text: "All knowledge is dangerous. The peril in knowledge is the price of it. It is a sacred fee for a rite, not a prohibition."

traits.locale_text: 「すべての知識は危険なものだ。知識に潜む危険は知識の代償。儀式の聖なる対価であり、止められるものではありません」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “所有的知识都很危险，知识中潜藏的风险正是知识的代价。它是仪式性的神圣价码，而不是禁令。”
languages.original_text: "All knowledge is dangerous. The peril in knowledge is the price of it. It is a sacred fee for a rite, not a prohibition."

traits.locale_text: “所有的知识都很危险，知识中潜藏的风险正是知识的代价。它是仪式性的神圣价码，而不是禁令。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Toute connaissance est dangereuse. Le péril qu'elle représente est le prix sacré à payer pour l'obtenir, et non une dissuasion. »
languages.original_text: "All knowledge is dangerous. The peril in knowledge is the price of it. It is a sacred fee for a rite, not a prohibition."

traits.locale_text: « Toute connaissance est dangereuse. Le péril qu'elle représente est le prix sacré à payer pour l'obtenir, et non une dissuasion. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Todo conocimiento es peligroso, y el peligro es lo que se debe pagar. Es el precio por realizar un rito, no una prohibición».
languages.original_text: "All knowledge is dangerous. The peril in knowledge is the price of it. It is a sacred fee for a rite, not a prohibition."

traits.locale_text: «Todo conocimiento es peligroso, y el peligro es lo que se debe pagar. Es el precio por realizar un rito, no una prohibición».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Alles Wissen ist gefährlich. Die Gefahr im Wissen ist der Preis dafür. Sie ist eine heilige Gebühr für einen Ritus, kein Hindernisgrund."
languages.original_text: "All knowledge is dangerous. The peril in knowledge is the price of it. It is a sacred fee for a rite, not a prohibition."

traits.locale_text: "Alles Wissen ist gefährlich. Die Gefahr im Wissen ist der Preis dafür. Sie ist eine heilige Gebühr für einen Ritus, kein Hindernisgrund."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Tüm bilgiler tehlikelidir. Risk, bilginin bedelidir. Engel olarak görülmemelidir. Zira ayin için gerekli, kutsal bir karşılıktır."
languages.original_text: "All knowledge is dangerous. The peril in knowledge is the price of it. It is a sacred fee for a rite, not a prohibition."

traits.locale_text: "Tüm bilgiler tehlikelidir. Risk, bilginin bedelidir. Ayin için gereken kutsal bir karşılıktır, bir engel değil."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
